title: font search: inside bjork dvd
content:
hi!

i’m a graphic design student from berlin.

can anybody tell me which font was used on the dvd cover of “inside bjork”?

and where can i get it? maybe for free with an education license for the font...

it’s not the “FIG script”...

with very best and thanx for your help

rm

\>watch the dvd cover: [http://images-eu.amazon.com/images/P/B0000U2076.03.LZZZZZZZ.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20071210203801/http:/images-eu.amazon.com/images/P/B0000U2076.03.LZZZZZZZ.jpg "http://images-eu.amazon.com/images/P/B0000U2076.03.LZZZZZZZ.jpg")

 [‹ (x) Script/handwritten font with flourishes - custom designed {Alex}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071210203801/http:/www.typophile.com/node/16608 "Go to previous forum topic") [One font, six gigposters: Aesthetic Apparatus, Largemammal Print, Smokestack, The Heads Of State, The Small Stakes ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071210203801/http:/www.typophile.com/node/16594 "Go to next forum topic")
author: zest-inc

comments.content: we get this a lot, it’s custom by M+M Paris, but you can find a similar font at [http://www.kinemamoon.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20071210203801/http:/www.kinemamoon.com/ "http://www.kinemamoon.com") \> Fonts \> Ito.
